long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app will put cute kittens on your screen. What more could you want out of a chrome extension?!?

Each time you press the kitten in the top right corner of your screen, a random cut kitten will appear on a new tab from the website http://placekitten.com .
